Subject: Re: New project proposal
Paragraphs:
Hi Alex,

Thanks for sending over the project proposal. I reviewed it and I think it looks great overall. There are a few areas where we might want to make some adjustments, but we can discuss those further during our next meeting. Overall, though, I think this is a project that has a lot of potential.

Let me know if you have any questions or if you want to schedule a time to discuss further.

Best,
Jane
